description:
Small canyon that would be good for initiations if it wasn't so full of trees and branches.

Approach

From the car, just go straight down the hill, this should get you approximately to the first waterfall.

Descent

Several smaller rappels in the water. The end has a nice succession. Unfortunately the whole canyon is full of trees.

Exit

The end of the canyon is in the stream of the Hongrin river which you have to cross and go up the steep slope until you reach the road almost 100m higher up.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Le Flon
